metadata.name: Clipboard Data Collection Via OSAScript
metadata.comment: Detects possible collection of data from the clipboard via execution of the osascript binary

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('osascript')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -e ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('clipboard')))

output.summary: Detects possible collection of data from the clipboard via execution of the osascript binary

metadata.objective: Examine fields: process.cmd_line False positive: Unlikely Reference: https://www.sentinelone.com/blog/how-offensive-actors-use-applescript-for-attacking-macos/
